headline: Lam Research (LRCX): Assessing Valuation After AI-Driven Upgrades and Strong Wafer Fab Demand
summary: Lam Research (LRCX) is riding a wave of AI driven optimism after a string of analyst upgrades and upbeat industry forecasts tied to heavier chipmaking budgets for memory, advanced packaging, and wafer fabrication tools. See our latest analysis for Lam Research. The latest rally has been anything but subtle, with Lam’s share price climbing to fresh highs on the back of upbeat AI capex forecasts, fund endorsements, and even CEO share sales that have not derailed bullish sentiment. This has left...
